Thanks to Secretlab for being the title sponsor of LMG Clips this year! Check out their ergonomic gaming chairs at the link above. Your back will thank you!

Check out Dell laptops at: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips

Nintendo's next-gen console is on the horizon, and Linus and Luke have a lot to say. From upgraded specs to the controversial voice chat system and a new approach to scalper prevention, the Switch 2 has people talking. Are the game prices justified? Should online features be locked behind a subscription? And is Nintendo finally treating their hardware with some respect? The guys share personal takes, some hot ones too, and dive deep into the broader implications for the gaming industry.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/live/k4fVtzRYLYw?si=6UhKmkQMrxl0A4xS

title: The Nintendo Switch 2 Situation
